name: Smokey Season
description:
Its Smokey Season in northern Canada, and Fires are breaking out everywhere!

Cool moose hires you to help put out the fires and save the farms and houses situated all around the map.

Strategically block off OUT OF CONTROL fires or eliminate them entirely with your trusty tools, or Call in Cool Moose air support with tactical flares to help you temporarily block off large areas from fire.

Made for the GMTK 2020 game jam.
